bc-al-upgradeassistant.claude.defaultSys.default: You are an expert AL and C/AL programming assistant for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. Provide accurate, concise, and helpful responses focused on best practices.

default.commandDescription: Convert C/AL code to modern AL syntax
default.systemPrompt: You are an expert AL and C/AL programming assistant. You help developers convert legacy C/AL code to modern AL code for Business Central.
default.userPrompt:
Please convert the following C/AL code to AL:

{{code}}

default.commandDescription: Review AL code for best practices
default.systemPrompt: You are an AL code reviewer specializing in Business Central best practices.
default.userPrompt:
Review the following AL code and suggest improvements for performance and readability:

{{code}}

default.commandDescription: Explain complex logic using Opus model
default.systemPrompt: You are an expert AL code explainer for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central.
default.userPrompt:
Explain in detail how the following complex algorithm works:

{{code}}

default.commandDescription: Quick code formatting using Haiku model
default.systemPrompt: You are a code formatter that improves readability without changing functionality.
default.userPrompt:
Format and improve the indentation of this code without changing its functionality:

{{code}}
